LinkItem.internal_link_text: Using the Azure CLI with the Resource Manager
Using the Azure CLI with the Resource Manager

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: # This will show you the subscriptions under the account. azure account list # Use the subscription name to select the one you want to work on. azure account set <subscription name>
azure role assignment list -g group1 --mail <user's email> -o Owner

CodeSpanItem.ItemValue: azure role assignment create --mail <user's email> -o Reader
azure role assignment create --mail <user's email> -o Reader
PS C:\> azure role assignment create --mail <user's email> -o Contributor -g group1
PS C:\> azure role assignment create --mail <user's email> -o Contributor -g group1
azure role assignment create --mail <user's email> -o Owner -g group1 -r Microsoft.Web/sites -u site1
azure role assignment create --mail <user's email> -o Owner -g group1 -r Microsoft.Web/sites -u site1

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: PS C:\> azure group list PS C:\> azure resource list
